description: Kubernetes monitoring dashboard powered by OpenTelemetry kubeletstats metrics stored in Apache Doris

targets.rawSql:
SELECT FLOOR(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) / 20) * 20 AS time,
  CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS metric,
  AVG(value) * 1000 AS value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.cpu.usage'
  AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME($__to/1000)
  AND ('${namespace:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${namespace:raw}')
  AND ('${node:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${node:raw}')
  AND ('${deployment:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.deployment.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${deployment:raw}')
  AND ('${pod:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${pod:raw}')
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1

SELECT FLOOR(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) / 20) * 20 AS time,
  CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS metric,
  AVG(value) AS value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.memory.working_set'
  AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME($__to/1000)
  AND ('${namespace:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${namespace:raw}')
  AND ('${node:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${node:raw}')
  AND ('${deployment:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.deployment.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${deployment:raw}')
  AND ('${pod:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${pod:raw}')
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1

SELECT FLOOR(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) / 20) * 20 AS time,
  CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS metric,
  AVG(value) * 100 AS value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.cpu_limit_utilization'
  AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME($__to/1000)
  AND ('${namespace:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${namespace:raw}')
  AND ('${node:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${node:raw}')
  AND ('${deployment:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.deployment.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${deployment:raw}')
  AND ('${pod:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${pod:raw}')
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1

SELECT FLOOR(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) / 20) * 20 AS time,
  CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS metric,
  AVG(value) * 100 AS value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.memory_limit_utilization'
  AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME($__to/1000)
  AND ('${namespace:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${namespace:raw}')
  AND ('${node:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${node:raw}')
  AND ('${deployment:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.deployment.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${deployment:raw}')
  AND ('${pod:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${pod:raw}')
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS name,
  CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS namespace,
  CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS node,
  CASE WHEN t1.value = 2 THEN 'Running' WHEN t1.value = 1 THEN 'Pending' WHEN t1.value = 3 THEN 'Succeeded' WHEN t1.value = 4 THEN 'Failed' ELSE 'Unknown' END AS status,
  ROUND(t2.cpu_m, 1) AS `CPU(m)`,
  ROUND(t3.mem_bytes) AS `Memory`,
  CASE WHEN t5.cpu_util IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE CONCAT(ROUND(t5.cpu_util * 100, 0), '%') END AS `CPU/Limit`,
  CASE WHEN t6.mem_util IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE CONCAT(ROUND(t6.mem_util * 100, 0), '%') END AS `Mem/Limit`,
  COALESCE(t4.restarts, 0) AS restarts,
  CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, STR_TO_DATE(CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.pod.start_time'] AS VARCHAR), '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%sZ'), NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, STR_TO_DATE(CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.pod.start_time'] AS VARCHAR), '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%sZ'), NOW()), 'd') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, STR_TO_DATE(CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.pod.start_time'] AS VARCHAR), '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%sZ'), NOW()), 'h') END AS age
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge t1
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS pod_name, AVG(value) * 1000 AS cpu_m
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.cpu.usage'
    AND timestamp >= (SELECT MAX(timestamp) - INTERVAL 60 SECOND FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.cpu.usage' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) t2 ON CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) = t2.pod_name
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS pod_name, AVG(value) AS mem_bytes
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.memory.working_set'
    AND timestamp >= (SELECT MAX(timestamp) - INTERVAL 60 SECOND FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.memory.working_set' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) t3 ON CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) = t3.pod_name
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS pod_name, MAX(value) AS restarts
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.container.restarts'
    AND timestamp >= (SELECT MAX(timestamp) - INTERVAL 60 SECOND FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.container.restarts' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) t4 ON CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) = t4.pod_name
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS pod_name, AVG(value) AS cpu_util
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.cpu_limit_utilization'
    AND timestamp >= (SELECT MAX(timestamp) - INTERVAL 60 SECOND FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.cpu_limit_utilization' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) t5 ON CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) = t5.pod_name
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS pod_name, AVG(value) AS mem_util
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.memory_limit_utilization'
    AND timestamp >= (SELECT MAX(timestamp) - INTERVAL 60 SECOND FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.memory_limit_utilization' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) t6 ON CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) = t6.pod_name
WHERE t1.metric_name = 'k8s.pod.phase'
  AND t1.timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.phase' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  AND ('${namespace:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${namespace:raw}')
  AND ('${node:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${node:raw}')
  AND ('${deployment:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.deployment.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${deployment:raw}')
  AND ('${pod:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${pod:raw}')
ORDER BY restarts DESC, name

SELECT FLOOR(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) / 20) * 20 AS time,
  CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS metric,
  AVG(value) * 1000 AS value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.cpu.usage'
  AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME($__to/1000)
  AND ('${node:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${node:raw}')
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1

SELECT FLOOR(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) / 20) * 20 AS time,
  CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS metric,
  AVG(value) AS value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.memory.working_set'
  AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME($__to/1000)
  AND ('${node:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${node:raw}')
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS node,
  CASE WHEN t1.value = 1 THEN 'Ready' ELSE 'Not Ready' END AS status,
  ROUND(COALESCE(t2.cpu_m, 0), 1) AS `CPU(m)`,
  t3.memory AS `Memory`,
  CASE WHEN t4.cpu_util IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE CONCAT(ROUND(t4.cpu_util * 100, 0), '%') END AS `CPU/Limit`,
  CASE WHEN t3.memory IS NULL OR t5.mem_avail IS NULL OR (t3.memory + t5.mem_avail) = 0 THEN '-' ELSE CONCAT(ROUND(t3.memory / (t3.memory + t5.mem_avail) * 100, 0), '%') END AS `Mem/Limit`
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge t1
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS node_name, AVG(value) * 1000 AS cpu_m
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.cpu.usage'
    AND timestamp >= (SELECT MAX(timestamp) - INTERVAL 60 SECOND FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.cpu.usage' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) t2 ON CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) = t2.node_name
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS node_name, AVG(value) AS memory
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.memory.working_set'
    AND timestamp >= (SELECT MAX(timestamp) - INTERVAL 60 SECOND FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.memory.working_set' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) t3 ON CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) = t3.node_name
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS node_name, AVG(value) AS cpu_util
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.cpu.utilization'
    AND timestamp >= (SELECT MAX(timestamp) - INTERVAL 60 SECOND FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.cpu.utilization' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) t4 ON CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) = t4.node_name
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS node_name, AVG(value) AS mem_avail
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.memory.available'
    AND timestamp >= (SELECT MAX(timestamp) - INTERVAL 60 SECOND FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.memory.available' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) t5 ON CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) = t5.node_name
WHERE t1.metric_name = 'k8s.node.condition_ready'
  AND t1.timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.condition_ready' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  AND ('${node:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(t1.resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${node:raw}')
ORDER BY node

SELECT FLOOR(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) / 20) * 20 AS time,
  CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS metric,
  SUM(value) * 1000 AS value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.cpu.usage'
  AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME($__to/1000)
  AND ('${namespace:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${namespace:raw}')
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1

SELECT FLOOR(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) / 20) * 20 AS time,
  CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS metric,
  SUM(value) AS value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.memory.working_set'
  AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME($__to/1000)
  AND ('${namespace:raw}' = 'All' OR CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) = '${namespace:raw}')
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Namespace Memory Usage (Sum of Working Set)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  p.ns AS namespace,
  CASE WHEN p.phase = 1 THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Terminating' END AS phase,
  ROUND(COALESCE(c.cpu_m, 0), 1) AS `CPU(m)`,
  m.memory AS `Memory`,
  CASE WHEN cu.cpu_util IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE CONCAT(ROUND(cu.cpu_util * 100, 0), '%') END AS `CPU/Limit`,
  CASE WHEN mu.mem_util IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE CONCAT(ROUND(mu.mem_util * 100, 0), '%') END AS `Mem/Limit`
FROM (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS ns, MAX(value) AS phase
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.namespace.phase'
    AND timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.namespace.phase' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) p
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS ns, SUM(value) * 1000 AS cpu_m
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.cpu.usage'
    AND timestamp >= (SELECT MAX(timestamp) - INTERVAL 60 SECOND FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.cpu.usage' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) c ON p.ns = c.ns
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS ns, SUM(value) AS memory
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.memory.working_set'
    AND timestamp >= (SELECT MAX(timestamp) - INTERVAL 60 SECOND FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.memory.working_set' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) m ON p.ns = m.ns
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS ns, AVG(value) AS cpu_util
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.cpu_limit_utilization'
    AND timestamp >= (SELECT MAX(timestamp) - INTERVAL 60 SECOND FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.cpu_limit_utilization' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) cu ON p.ns = cu.ns
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS ns, AVG(value) AS mem_util
  FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
  WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.memory_limit_utilization'
    AND timestamp >= (SELECT MAX(timestamp) - INTERVAL 60 SECOND FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.memory_limit_utilization' AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME($__from/1000))
  GROUP BY 1
) mu ON p.ns = mu.ns
WHERE ('${namespace:raw}' = 'All' OR p.ns = '${namespace:raw}')
ORDER BY namespace

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.namespace.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS __text FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.phase' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR ORDER BY 1
list.label: Namespace
list.name: namespace

list.query: SELECT DISTINCT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.node.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS __text FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.condition_ready' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR ORDER BY 1

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.deployment.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS __text FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.deployment.available' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR ORDER BY 1
list.label: Deployment
list.name: deployment
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.deployment.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS __text FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.deployment.available' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR ORDER BY 1

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT CAST(resource_attributes['k8s.pod.name'] AS VARCHAR) AS __text FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.pod.phase' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR ORDER BY 1

title: K8s Observability - Doris
